title: Authorization via App Store
content:
‚ùó Important: Authorizing via the Seller Center App Store only applies to public apps. Public apps must meet specific criteria and pass TikTok Shop's app review process. For more information on developing a public app, please visit our [app development overview](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/app-development-overview). # App installation authorization To authorize your public app, the seller should use the left-hand menu to navigate to **Growth** **> App store**. Here they will find a full list of apps they can install and authorize:
After finding your app to install, the seller will be prompted with the following:
After entering the required information, the seller will be presented with the step to authorize:
Finally, the seller will be redirected to your **Redirect URL**, and will be required to log in to your app to finish the authorization process:
